from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from mqtt import *
from machine import RTC
import ntptime
import time
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from event_manager import *
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

event_manager.reset()

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

def on_event_timer_callback_J_g_P_t_i():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, RH, LUX, pir
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  RT = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  RH = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  LUX = round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RT)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('  ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(8, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RH)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('  ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(LUX)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  mqtt.publish('temp-info', RT)
  mqtt.publish('humi-info', RH)
  mqtt.publish('light2', LUX)

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_J_g_P_t_i)

def on_event_timer_callback_U_t_E_r_i():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, RH, LUX, pir
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[2])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(2, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('/')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(3, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[1])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('/')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[0])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(14, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[5])))

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_U_t_E_r_i)

def on_event_timer_callback_Y_X_n_U_C():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, RH, LUX, pir
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(':')
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  time.sleep_ms(1000)

event_manager.add_timer_event(2000, on_event_timer_callback_Y_X_n_U_C)

def on_event_timer_callback_a_g_V_A_t():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, RH, LUX, pir
  if pin3.read_digital()==1:
    if pir == 0:
      display.set_all('#ff0000')
      pir = '1'
      mqtt.publish('motion', pir)
  else:
    if pir == 1:
      display.set_all('#000000')
      pir = '0'
      mqtt.publish('motion', pir)

event_manager.add_timer_event(1000, on_event_timer_callback_a_g_V_A_t)

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin0.pin, 4)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__button1_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global RT, RH, LUX, pir
  if th_C3_B4ng_tin == '0':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
  elif th_C3_B4ng_tin == '1':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ff0000'))

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__fan_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global RT, RH, LUX, pir
  pin10.write_analog(round(translate((int(th_C3_B4ng_tin)), 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def _C4_90_C4_83ng_K_C3_AD_K_C3_AAnh():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, RH, LUX, pir, aiot_dht20, aiot_lcd1602, tiny_rgb
  mqtt.on_receive_message('button1', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__button1_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('fan', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__fan_)

def on_button_a_pressed():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, RH, LUX, pir
  tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ff0000'))

button_a.on_pressed = on_button_a_pressed

def on_button_b_pressed():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, RH, LUX, pir
  tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))

button_b.on_pressed = on_button_b_pressed

if True:
  display.scroll('YH')
  mqtt.connect_wifi('mot chiec Xoai', 'hieu301203')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='io.adafruit.com', port=1883, username='LamVinh', password='aio_uLJU69t5X62ciapGElvWGcEbs7jG')
  ntptime.settime()
  (year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour, minute, second, milisecond) = RTC().datetime()
  RTC().init((year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour+7, minute, second, milisecond))
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  _C4_90_C4_83ng_K_C3_AD_K_C3_AAnh()
  display.scroll('OK')

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  mqtt.check_message()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
